short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple task managements application. Code at: https://github.com/64J0/Extensions_Chrome/tree/master/Local-TO-DO.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension can be used to track the activities you want to do in a regular/working day, and once the activity is complete you can just mark the checkbox to erase it from the list. In other words, it's just a TO-DO application.
The extension logo has been taken from https://www.flaticon.com/authors/freepik.
